thread.title: McDonald's stock hit with biggest slide in 10 years

title: McDonald's stock hit with biggest slide in 10 years
text:
McDonald's stock slammed as value menu loses its bite 4:28am IST - 01:39 
Shares of McDonald's tumbled five percent in the stock's biggest one-day slide in roughly a decade after a Wall Street analyst questioned the success of the fast-food giant's updated value menu.   
Shares of McDonald's tumbled five percent in the stock's biggest one-day slide in roughly a decade after a Wall Street analyst questioned the success of the fast-food giant's updated value menu.  //reut.rs/2HY5jeD
